node.title: Bishop condemns 'ignorant, divisive' anti-vax parishioners peddling myths
node.alt: Bishop James Foley dressed in full robes stands inside a church in Cairns.
node.description: The head of the Catholic diocese in Cairns says he has never before encountered such "dangerous and soul destroying" ignorance in almost 30 years in the job.Â
node.content:
["The head of the Catholic diocese in Cairns has heavily criticised\u00a0parishioners spreading coronavirus vaccine myths, labelling them divisive and ignorant.", "Bishop James Foley this morning said that\u00a0people within his church were \"campaigning against vaccination on all sorts of ill-founded prejudice\".", "Among the misinformation Bishop Foley said he had received were claims coronavirus vaccines contained cells from unborn fetuses \u2014 erroneous information he said he had no time for.", "\"In almost 30 years in this position, I've never encountered such divisiveness and, dare I say, ignorance,\" Bishop Foley said.", "\"I'm really concluding that I'm wasting my time\u00a0talking to them and they're wasting their time talking to me.\"", "
'Dangerous and soul destroying'
", "Vaccination rates in the Cairns Local Government Area (LGA) have increased sharply in the past week.", "More than 70 per cent of the region's eligible population has\u00a0now received both doses of a coronavirus vaccine, while 83 per cent has\u00a0had a single dose.", "The\u00a0Cairns and Hinterland Hospital and Health Service yesterday announced it had delivered 8,421 vaccines in the previous seven days.", "", "
Bishop James Foley\u00a0says everyone is welcome at church, regardless of\u00a0their vaccination status.(Supplied: Cairns Catholic Diocese)
", "Bishop Foley said he had been unable to change the minds of those who had come to him with, what he described as, \"erroneous ideas\".", "\"What worries me too, in these conversations, is that they seem to entail all sorts of other major conspiracy theories,\" he said.", "\"It's making people angry;\u00a0it's polarising and it's just not of God.\"", "
Everyone welcome at Mass
", "Another of the malicious rumours Bishop Foley said was spreading through the Catholic community was that unvaccinated parishioners would not be welcome in churches.", "\"I've said that those who take the Eucharist to people at home, to aged care, to hospital or help distribute communion at Mass need to be vaccinated because we shouldn't be running any risk of contaminating others,\" Bishop Foley said.", "\"That's the sort of thing that's being thrown back at me.\"", "Bishop Foley said a summary, or catechism, of the Fifth Commandment, 'Thou shall not kill,' obliges all Catholics to look after their own health and life.", "\"And I'd extend that to our own mental health which I think is very tested by this,\" he said."]
